name: CATTACK THE BLOCK
description:
BEST PLAYED WITH OTHER PEOPLE!
Choose your name, colour and cat.  You have 3 minutes to hold as much territory as you can by circling around buildings to claim them. 

If you cross an enemy cat's trail, their trail is destroyed from where you intersect it.  If you approach an enemy cat, 'interact' (press a / left click) to fight them.  The cat who can button bash the fastest will win and the loser will respawn back at their home.

Be weary while out exploring, however.  Your owner will get worried if you don't return home enough.  Interact with your home to raise the 'Concerned Bar' which will give you more time outside.  If your Concerned Bar reaches 0, you will be sent home immediately.  

Alternatively, you can just run around meowing, hissing and purring to your heart's content!

The cat with the most buildings in their colour at the end is the winner!
